program.name: ruby
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix[67]*) # -qinfo=por needed to avoid some __attribute__ definitions # being accepted which leads to compile failures for # ext/dl/cfunc.c CC=xlc_r CFLAGS="-O2 -qinfo=por -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 \ -qarch=ppc" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-aix*) # -qinfo=por needed to avoid some __attribute__ definitions # being accepted which leads to compile failures for # ext/dl/cfunc.c CC=xlc_r CFLAGS="-O1 -qinfo=por -qro -qroconst -ma -qmaxmem=-1 \ -qarch=ppc" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; ia64*-hpux*) # +O2 causes testsuite failure CC=cc CFLAGS="+O1 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," LDFLAGS="-Wl,+nodefaultrpath" ;; *-hpux11.00) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux11.11) # +Onolimit causes testsuite failure CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
ARGS="ac_cv_func_finite=no" ;; *-hpux*) # +Onolimit causes testsuite failure CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CC=c99 CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "s|50.times|1.times|" bootstraptest/test_io.rb export ac_cv_func_isinf=no ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; x86_64*-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) # optimisations off to prevent segfaults in tests CC=cc CFLAGS="-nodtk -msym -arch ev5 -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="${SB_VAR_NCURSES+-I${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_NCURSES+-I${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC}/ncurses} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+-I${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBREADLINE+-I${SB_VAR_LIBREADLINE_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBYAML+-I${SB_VAR_LIBYAML_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+-I${SB_VAR_LIBZ_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_TCL+-I${SB_VAR_TCL_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_TK+-I${SB_VAR_TK_INC}} \ ${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} \ ${SB_VAR_NCURSES+-L${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+-L${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBREADLINE+-L${SB_VAR_LIBREADLINE_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBYAML+-L${SB_VAR_LIBYAML_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+-L${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}\ ${SB_VAR_NCURSES+:${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBREADLINE+:${SB_VAR_LIBREADLINE_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBYAML+:${SB_VAR_LIBYAML_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+:${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ --enable-shared --with-mantype=man --disable-rpath \ --with-rubyhdrdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include" \ --with-sitedir="${_sitedir:-${SB_VAR_RUBYP}/lib}" \ --with-vendordir="${_vendordir:-${SB_VAR_RUBYP}/vendor/lib}" \ ${SB_VAR_TCL+--with-tclConfig-dir="${SB_VAR_TCL_LIB}"} \ ${SB_VAR_TK+--with-tkConfig-dir="${SB_VAR_TK_LIB}"} \ ${_ruby_lib+--with-ruby-lib=${_ruby_lib}} \ --enable-install-doc ${ARGS+${ARGS}} --datarootdir=${_datadir} \ --datadir=${_datadir} --libdir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} \ --mandir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man" \ --sysconfdir=${_sysconfdir} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
# Don't build DBM/GDBM libraries rm -rf ${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}/ext/dbm ${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}/ext/gdbm
# Fix paths ${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!/usr/local/bin/ruby!${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/ruby!" man/ruby.1
# Add vendor directory to Gem search path ${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!@RUBYP@!${SB_VAR_RUBYP}/vendor/lib/1.9.1!;" \ lib/rubygems/defaults.rb
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!@RUBYP@!${SB_VAR_RUBYP}!;" \ lib/rubygems.rb
program.install:
gmake install
# move gem directories outside rubyp (cd ${SB_VAR_RUBYP}/lib/1.9.1 ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/ruby/gems/1.9.1 mv cache doc gems specifications \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/ruby/gems/1.9.1)
# uninstall testrb #rm -rf ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/testrb
# relink binaries/libraries so libruby runtime path is correct case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in hppa*-hpux*) _archdir=$(${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/ruby -e \ 'load "rbconfig"; include Config; print CONFIG["archdir"];')
rm ruby find ${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}/.ext -name \*.sl -exec rm {} \;
# quote \@ for perl _install_prefix=$(echo ${INSTALL_PREFIX} | sed 's/@/\\@/')
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!-L\.!-L${_install_prefix}/lib!" Makefile gmake ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 ruby ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/ruby gmake install-bin install-ext ;; esac
set -e mv ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/libruby-static.a \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/libruby.a ranlib ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/libruby.a || :
# default include.paths configuration file and directory ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_sysconfdir} \ ${_sysconfdir}/include.paths.d ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 /dev/null \ ${_sysconfdir}/include.paths
${SB_PATH_CHOWN} -hR 0:0 ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
